description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Optimize mod loading speed in the mod management page  
2. New feature: Recommend compatible resource pack/world/shaders versions based on the currently selected game version  
3. Add Ukrainian and German language support  
4. Fix incorrect height of renderer selection dialog on some devices  
5. Fix the issue where the auto-creation of ".nomedia" files feature failed in custom directories

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.优化模组管理页面模组加载速度
2.新增功能：根据当前选择的版本推荐资源包/世界/光影版本
3.增加乌克兰语和德语
4.修复部分设备上渲染器选择对话框高度不正确的问题
5.修复自建目录自动创建“.nomedia”文件功能不生效的问题
